verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:25
verses.text: Now therefore, I pray thee, pardon my sin, and turn again with me, that I may worship the Lord.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:26
verses.text: And Samuel said unto Saul, I will not return with thee: for thou hast rejected the word of the Lord, and the Lord hath rejected thee from being king over Israel.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 15:27
verses.text: And as Samuel turned about to go away, he laid hold upon the skirt of his mantle, and it rent.
